title: 10 marketing jobs: KFit, 42Race, Modalku and more
text:
Looking for opportunities in marketing & public relations? We have handpicked 10 jobs for you this week. Click on the links below and apply away!
Recruiting and keen to list your jobs in future articles? Click here to create your company profile and post jobs. We feature jobs based on the following criteria:
Activity of recruiters on the platform. Recruiters who actively post new jobs, remove old ones, and accept/reject applicants will have higher chances of being featured. Completeness of company profile and job details. Company with incomplete profile or poor job description will not be featured. SEO Specialist at UrbanIndo 
UrbanIndo is an online real estate marketplace in Indonesia that combines thousands of property listings with up-to-date market data and local information.
Work location: Bandung, Indonesia / Full-time Requirement: Ability to analyze organic search performance and identify improvement opportunities, has basic knowledge in HTML Programming and good analytical thinking. Skills: Digital marketing, SEO. Salary Range: IDR 3,000,000 – 4,000,000 Equity: Yes More jobs at UrbanIndo 
Fave Pay Promoter and Marketing at KFit 
KFit is an online subscription platform that provides users an access into fitness studios, classes, and gyms in various cities across Asia.
Work location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia / Internship Requirement: Person who love to be up and about, constantly engaging with people, and not afraid to get their hands dirty, has a can-do attitude. Skills: Marketing. Salary Range: MYR 700 – 900 More jobs at KFit 
Marketing Manager at 42Race 
42Race is running platforms in Southeast Asia with more than 20,000 runners. Their aim to provide the best running experience that all runners.
Work location: Singapore / Full-time Requirement: Good time management, able to multi-task and meet tight deadlines, familiar with Adobe Suite, has some experience with WordPress and eDM (email marketing). Skills: Marketing communications. Salary Range: SGD 2,000 – 3,000 Equity: Yes More jobs at 42Race 
Digital Marketing Associate at Tiffson Co. 
Tiffson Co. offers an integrated marketing and logistic solution to all manufacturers. As global borderless e-commerce becomes the leading source of merchant transactions, they want to replace the traditional ways of sales distribution.
Work location: Hong Kong / Full-time Requirement: Minimum 1 years of experience in managing multilingual websites, good analytical skills and well-structured in problem-solving. Skills: English language, marketing, SEO/SEM. Salary Range: HKD 9,500 – 19,000 More jobs at Tiffson Co. 
Mandarin & English Content Writer at Modalku 
Modalku is an online marketplace for small businesses to acquire loans and for lenders to fund small business loans to earn compelling returns.
Work location: Jakarta, Indonesia / Full-time Requirement: Interest in digital marketing, lead generation, SEO content optimization, outstanding communication skills with the ability to clearly present ideas Skills: Content strategy, writing. More jobs at Modalku 
Digital Marketing Specialist at BusOnlineTicket 
BusOnlineTicket.com is one-stop online bus ticket booking portal for express bus companies in Singapore, Malaysia, and Thailand.
Work location: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia / Full-time Requirement: Minimum 1-year of working experience in the related field is required for this position, ability to research on the latest digital marketing technology. Skills: Digital marketing, SEO/SEM, social media marketing. Salary Range: MYR 3,000 – 4,500 More jobs at BusOnlineTicket 
Marketing and Communications Intern at Igloohome 
igloohome is a home automation company that has created several smart home devices. The most notable one is the igloohome smart lock that allows homeowners to grant access to their homes remotely, via our mobile app.
Work location: Tanjong Pagar, Singapore / Internship Requirement: Experience in creative design, especially with Photoshop or other image editing software strongly preferred, versatile and quick to learn. Skills: Communications, marketing communications, writing. Salary Range: SGD 400 – 500 More jobs at Igloohome 
Creative Writing & Translating at Samurai Internet 
Samurai Internet with ‘NewPropertyList.my’ is property portal site for people who are looking for new property in Malaysia. The portal has various types of search options and shows the detail of each property information, its location, price, photo, and floor plan.
Work location: Cyberjaya, Malaysia / Internship Requirement: Highly proficient in spoken and written English & Mandarin, have a Communication (or relevant) education background. Skills: Creative writing, marketing communications, PR. Salary Range: MYR 500 – 500 More jobs at Samurai Internet 
Copywriter at Protocol Pte Ltd 
PROTOCOL is a social media agency with a strong creative influence that help clients achieve brand advocacy through developing strategies that transcend traditional, digital, and social media platforms.
Work location: Tanjong Pagar, Singapore / Full-time Requirement: Possess an immaculate attention to detail and the capacity to meet a constant barrage of deadlines, ability to take feedback and at times criticism. Skills: Copywriting, social media, social media marketing. Salary Range: SGD 2,000 – 3,000 More jobs at Protocol Pte Ltd 
Marketing Internship at No-Location 
No-Location is a large group booking service that finds accommodation for groups or events in Asia and also helps organizations arrange events that will take place in locations of their choice.
Work location: Bali, Indonesia / Internship Requirement: Interested in tourism, lifestyle entrepreneurship, hospitality, ability to ensure customer satisfaction in Bali. Skills: Marketing, social media marketing. More jobs at No-Location
